Function reference

All functions

assign_prov_state()
Categorize polygon by Province/State if applicable
generate_cont_indices() generate_regional_indices() generate_strata_indices() generate_cont_trend() generate_regional_trends() generate_strata_trends() get_final_values() get_mcmc_list() extract_index_data() get_prepared_data() get_strata_area() get_composite_regions() plot_cont_indices() prepare_jags_data() p_waic() waic()
bbsBayes defunct functions
generate_map() geofacet_plot()
bbsBayes deprecated functions
bbs_data_sample
Sample BBS data
bbs_models
List of models available
bbs_strata
List of established strata
bird_sample
Sample point count data per species (Pacific Wren only)
convergence()
Convergence metrics
fetch_bbs_data()
Fetch Breeding Bird Survey dataset (TIDY)
fetch_bbs_data_orig()
Fetch Breeding Bird Survey dataset
generate_indices()
Regional annual indices of abundance
generate_trends()
Generate regional trends
have_bbs_data()
Check whether BBS data exists
load_bbs_data()
Load Breeding Bird Survey dataset into R Session (TIDY)
load_map()
Load a map of of the geographic strata.
pacific_wren_model
Example model output
plot_geofacet()
Create geofacet plot of population trajectories by province/state
plot_indices()
Generate plots of index trajectories by stratum
plot_map()
Generate a map of trends by strata
prepare_data()
Wrangle data to use for modelling input (STAN TIDY)
prepare_spatial()
Define neighbouring strata for spatial analyses
remove_cache()
Remove bbsBayes cache
route_sample
Sample route data per year run (Pacific Wren only)
run_model()
Run Bayesian model
save_model_run()
Save output of run_model()
search_species()
Search for species
species_forms
Species forms
species_sample
Sample North American bird species list (Pacific Wren only)
stratify()
Stratify and filter Breeding Bird Survey data
